sect2.title: Introduction to PCRE
sect2.para: The PCRE package contains Perl Compatible Regular Expression libraries. These are useful for implementing regular expression pattern matching using the same syntax and semantics as Perl 5.

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --enable-utf8: This switch includes the code for handling UTF-8 character strings in the library.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The PCRE package contains the libpcre libraries, pcregrep, pcretest and pcre-config.

sect3.title: pcregrep
sect3.para: pcregrep is a grep that understands Perl compatible regular expressions.

sect3.title: pcretest
sect3.para: pcretest can test your Perl compatible regular expression.

sect3.title: pcre-config
sect3.para: pcre-config is used during the compile process of programs linking to this library.
